whyChooseUs.everyone.info: A brand means nothing without you. All your brands in one place, a cool interface, you do stuff, you get cash, you buy whatever you want. No more old-fashioned gifts, no more poorly rewarding programs. {link}
whyChooseUs.brands.info: Time to social up & engage with your communities. Don‚Äôt worry about complexity. Launch a specific program in ten minutes. Monitor it in one screen. Or just ask your agency / community manager. {link}
whyChooseUs.agencies.info: Save on dev, free up time to engage top-tier communities from your clients‚Äô brands. Collaborate with motivated people and get paid for actual results (sales, revenue, word of mouth...). Test our solution and get your monthly plan to {link}

features.challenges.info: Need to boost sales? Discover the incredible animation possibilities with RewardzAi¬Æ and launch in a few clicks your social network to motivate and reward your sales forces, direct and indirect, or your distribution network, across more than 500 performance criteria.
features.loyalty.info: Need to increase your customer value? RewardzAi¬Æ is a web/mobile social network that enables you to increase tenfold your brand loyalty, trigger impulse purchases, upsell more, and reward every day every action taken by your clients.
features.loyalty.sponsorship.info: Need to generate leads? What better way to create your social network, to recommend your brand, your products or your events? With RewardzAi¬Æ, get every connection become an ambassador of your commercial endeavor, by launching in a few clicks viral reward programs with maximum efficiency.
howItWorks.step1.info: Choose the type of rewards program, its design, its audience, its goals. That‚Äôs it. Ten minutes only.
howItWorks.step2.info: Manage everything from your wall: your rewards program is dressed as an augmented social network, with all the emailing, CRM and data catching (GDPR compliant) features you need.
howItWorks.step3.info: Build on your success, duplicate a program and deploy it to a new community. You can now test new approaches, you have access to unlimited possibilities, thanks to our relational marketing solution.

You can go on your favorite website and order whatever you want with your virtual card. Just choose your
product, and when you will have to fill up the payment method, enter your card‚Äôs numbers as you would do with
a regular card. OR you can link that card into your payment app into your mobile.

ai.submit.text: With RewardzAi, customize your AI according to your needs and unique style! Choose from our featured AI options and upload your own PDF files for a tailored experience. ai.perso.text:
We offer a range of AIs and training programs to enrich your challenges. 

 Please note that you can only subscribe to a training program if you choose an AI whose name contains the title ‚ÄúAcademy‚Äù. 

 üöÄ Your challenge will be even more fun with a well-configured AI! 

 After launching your program, go to the AI menu in the sidebar to customize your experience, then invite your users to participate.
